org.pepstock.charba.client.plugins

Class AbstractPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.plugins.AbstractPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Plugin
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChartBackgroundColor, ChartPointer, DatasetsItemsSelector

    public abstract class AbstractPlugin
extends java.lang.Object
implements Plugin
    Implements a plugin interface to help who will create a plugin do not create all methods.
    The only method not implemented is getId which must implemented.
    All onBefore* cancellable methods return true.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

      • onBeforeUpdate

        public boolean onBeforeUpdate(AbstractChart<?,?> chart)
        Description copied from interface: Plugin
        Called before updating 'chart'. If any plugin returns false, the update is cancelled (and thus subsequent render(s)) until another 'update' is triggered.
        Specified by:
        onBeforeUpdate in interface Plugin
        Parameters:
        chart - the chart instance.
        Returns:
        false to cancel the chart update.

      • onBeforeDraw

        public boolean onBeforeDraw(AbstractChart<?,?> chart,
                            double easing)
        Description copied from interface: Plugin
        Called before drawing 'chart' at every animation frame specified by the given easing value. If any plugin returns false, the frame drawing is cancelled until another 'render' is triggered.
        Specified by:
        onBeforeDraw in interface Plugin
        Parameters:
        chart - the chart instance.
        easing - The current animation value, between 0.0 and 1.0.
        Returns:
        false to cancel the chart drawing.
